title: More than half of Americans plan to get updated COVID shot
description: There's a sharp partisan divide, but interest blows away uptake of the last booster.

title: Keeping Google’s search secrets protects its monopoly, DOJ argues in court
description: The DOJ objected when the court removed the public from the Google trial on Monday.

title: A water carrier just won the hardest cycling race on the planet
description: The cycling drama came to a head on top of the most demanding mountain in Europe.

title: Autoworker strike could give GM breathing room to fix battery production
description: A production pause could let GM solve a battery cell manufacturing headache.

title: Report: Unity considering revenue-based fee caps, self-reported install numbers
description: Engine maker may also eliminate "retroactive" install counts for minimum thresholds.

title: Musk and Netanyahu blame “armies of bots” for spreading antisemitism on X
description: Israeli prime minister praised Musk's "opposition to antisemitism" in X chat.

title: Hell freezes over, MS Paint adds support for layers and PNG transparency
description: Automated background removal was also added recently.

title: Ancient Roman “wow glass” has photonic crystal patina forged over centuries
description: Precise hierarchical molecular self-assembly formed so-called "Bragg stack" reflectors.

title: Dealmaster: Early Amazon Prime Big Day deals, Lenovo laptop savings, and more
description: Amazon announced that Prime Big Day Deals will happen on October 10 and 11 this year.

title: tvOS 17’s extra column of icons is its most useful new feature in years
description: Apple once had higher hopes for what has stubbornly remained a TV-streaming box.

title: Google Domains halts registrations as it waits for the Google Grim Reaper
description: The transition to Squarespace apparently started a few days ago.

title: Apple will charge you way less to fix cracked back glass on an iPhone 15 Pro
description: Fixing damaged rear glass on a Pro phone used to cost half as much as a new one.

title: iOS 17, iPadOS 17, watchOS 10, and tvOS 17 are all available to download now
description: Apple Watch gets a big overhaul, while most other updates focus on refinements.

title: Unity promises “changes” to install fee plans as developer fallout continues
description: Statement comes as publishers threaten boycotts, developers move to other engines.

title: Panos Panay, leader of the Surface and Windows teams, is leaving Microsoft
description: Will be replaced by Yusuf Mehdi, who has been leading the way on AI efforts.

title: Geopolitics complicates Apple’s relationship with China
description: A resurgent Huawei and restrictions on government use of Apple products pose challenges.

title: Stoke Space hops its upper stage, leaping toward a fully reusable rocket
description: "It was great to get that notch in our belt."

title: Here’s what the latest Mars rover has learned so far
description: Catch up on the Mars 2020 mission in 2023.
